entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Get System.ArgumentException error when exiting net 8 or 9 mobile windows app that used border.shadow #25014
  • Leak caused by activity indicator. #25012
  • CollectionView throws java.lang.IllegalStateException on Android when using RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand #25010
  • PushAsync hangs if app is running in the background #25009
  • ContentPage Property InputTransparent = true, causes blank page #25007
  • CollectionView with Entry starts to endless scrolling with HorizontalTextAlignment="End" or HorizontalTextAlignment="Center". #25005
  • [MAUI]Go to 'My Recipes' page throw exception"Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory " #25002
  • Memory leak in animations #25001
  • Changing Translation of an element causes Maui in iOS to constantly run Measure & ArrangeChildren (likely cause of brutal iOS Layout performance issues) #24996
  • "System.InvalidOperationException" exception occurs when closing the Blazer+Winform application #24995

Closed

  • NullReferenceException with a platform-specific GestureRecognizer #24900
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Unable to debug MAUI android source code as it contains the bug because VS 2022 cannot find source symbol files #22577
  • Black Screen when resuming iOS App when debugging #24793
  • ILLINK errors when compiling MAUI apps on Mac - says targeting version that I'm not #24981
  • Cannot using the control of CommunityToolkit.WinUI.Controls.Primitives #24982
  • App crashes on launch during Apple App Review (iOS 18.0 - iPad Air 5th Generation) #24805
    9.0-rc2
  • [Android] Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException: 'No view found for id 0x7f0900fd (com.twe.elon:id/labeled) for fragment NavigationRootManager_ElementBasedFragment{e99ccf3} (d735450b-8b7e-4e10-87d0-3b9a8251e4b3 id=0x7f0900fd)' #24774
    9.0-rc2
  • Unable to set flyout burger menu icon color in Shell when customized with FontImageSource #24857
  • iOS crash with TestFlight, UseInterpreter no longer working properly with latest .NET8 #24836
    9.0-rc2
  • I cannot select API Level 35 for Android. #24813
    9.0-rc2
  • Asp.net core #24853

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0] Move to rtm #25017
  • Remove excessive Picker API comment #25016
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update the Benchmarks.Droid app to use built in Android GetExternalFilesDir #25015
    community ✨
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    community ✨
  • Fixed Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.90 (Latest stable) Ruins Entry Controls #25006
    community ✨
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    community ✨
  • Fixed Size not calculated properly when invoking UseMauiCompatibility method in MauiProgram #25003
    community ✨
  • Fixed NavigationPage TitleBar visibility issue when set to the parent page #25000
    community ✨
  • Fixed Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24999
    community ✨
  • (Re)enable Mail API for Mac Catalyst #24998
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-essentials
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Update rc2 internal #25013
  • [C] avoid NRE on null GestureRecognizer #25008
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20240925231640755 to net9.0 #24935
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24953
    9.0-rc2

Updated

  • Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers (attempt 2) #24952
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • Revert #24222 and simply use `invalidate` instead of `postInvalidate` #24990
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • [iOS] Text alignment in editor - improvements #24859
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
    area-controls-image
  • Fix disabled WebView Cookie Tests #24978
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • [Windows] Skip initial assignments in property mapper (take 3) #23987
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-core-platform
  • CollectionView Header/Footer/EmptyView issues when adding/removing items. #24830
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨
  • Fix for Windows SearchBar MaxLength > 0 not working properly. #24919
    community ✨
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    community ✨
